answerText: the Ozarks [accept the Ozark Mountains or the Ozark Plateau][10] The Ozarks also spill into the northeastern region of this state, whose second-largest city is Tulsa.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2014 | Editors Round 2 | 4 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Vance Randolph studied the folklore of this region. For 10 points each: [10] Name this region near the Ouachita Mountains, which takes up much of Missouri and northern Arkansas.
